thread.section_title: Novotel Paris Vaugirard Montparnasse - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Above average
thread.title_full: Above average - Review of Novotel Paris Vaugirard Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: GÃ©rard L
title: Above average
text:
A good place to stay.
Reception is friendly and efficient.
My room was nice and clean.
The airconditioner has a sign that the room can only be heated and not cooled.
I did not mind that the coffee/tea supply in the room was depleated when I arrived as I do not use it anyway in the room. Just yesterday I was surprised that the TV was running in my room when I came home although I had not switched it on.
The breakfast buffet is average.
All this sounds a bit negative, but I must affirm that I had a quite pleasant stay there and the hotel suffices well for a participant in a conference like me who just wants to have a clean place to sleep.
